name: @XUL - Rounded Tabs
description:
Change the appearance of tabs on your browser

1. Current Tab - Only upper corners are Rounded
2. Other Tabs  - All corners are Rounded
 
 
This stylesheet is inspired by fools-gold's "4 Design of Tabã€€Only the selected tab"
http://userstyles.org/styles/12942

<<Feel free to leave your comments, opinions, requests, whatever...>>
additional_info:
========== Change Log ==========
Sep 24, 2013: Added a comment to meet global styles criteria by Stylish described at https://github.com/JasonBarnabe/stylish/wiki/Preventing-global-styles
Mar 30, 2012: Added official border-radius
